remarks: Cancellation law for group division.  ( ~ nnncan1 analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 7-Mar-2008.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
abldiv.1 $e |- X = ran G $.
abldiv.3 $e |- D = ( /g ` G ) $.
ablonnncan1 $p |- ( ( G e. AbelOp /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( A D B ) D ( A D C ) ) = ( C D B ) ) $.
